mapper.update:
update irl_prod_int
INT_TYPE = #{intType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_TYPE = #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATE_AMT_ID = #{rateAmtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INT_AMT_ID = #{intAmtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECAL_METHOD = #{recalMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INT_START = #{intStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INT_DAYS_TYPE = #{intDaysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INT_CALC_BAL = #{intCalcBal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INT_APPL_TYPE = #{intApplType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLL_FREQ = #{rollFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLL_DAY = #{rollDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_RATE = #{minRate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MAX_RATE = #{maxRate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INT_RATE_IND = #{intRateInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH_BASIS = #{monthBasis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_MATCH_TYPE = #{prodMatchType,jdbcType=CHAR}
where EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND INT_CLASS = #{intClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into irl_prod_int
PROD_TYPE,
EVENT_TYPE,
INT_TYPE,

TAX_TYPE,

INT_AMT_ID,
RECAL_METHOD,
COMPANY,
INT_START,

INT_CALC_BAL,
INT_APPL_TYPE,
ROLL_FREQ,
ROLL_DAY,
MIN_RATE,
MAX_RATE,
INT_RATE_IND,
MONTH_BASIS,
PROD_MATCH_TYPE,
